channel.title: Themes on About Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Themes on About Hugo

item.title: Whisper Theme Tryout
item.description: A sleek, beautiful documentation theme based on bootstrap, which is also used for this page.

item.title: Hugo Geekdoc Theme Tryout
item.description: Geekdoc is an elegant comprehensive documentation theme based on Bootstrap. My current recommendation for big documentation sites, although I haven’t done much with it yet.

item.title: Doks Theme Tryout
item.description: A minimal theme that combines documentation with a blog, and has dark/light theme switch.

item.title: Theme Cards Tryout
item.description: This is a theme based on HBStack. HBStack is is a modular framework for building Hugo pages, see https://hbstack.dev/ Both the framework and theme are massive and seem well-designed and powerful; before starting a project with it some time would be necessary to explore and evaluate this framework.
